channel.title: Help with School project
channel.description:
For my IT course work I have to produce a leaflet, I have decided to do a SCAR/SRL related leaflet. I have made the design and have completed the silly write up. I do know a rough history of SCAR and SRL however could someone provide me the infomation about the following as I am surpose to find it somewhere on the internet.
History Basic Scripting Guide (sorta got this anyway) How to install SCAR / SRL (got the SCAR bit) Using Scripts Credits (Was gonna put some people like mopar and starblaster- I need some infomation about them)
The final and part that i cant really do on my own is collect images, I can take screen shots but it would be nice to get some photos of WT , Mopar , Starblaster and so on. Also if anyone has any large copys of logos that would be appreciated. Before any of you think i am cheating, we are surpose to rawly rip infomation off the net and then edit it. This is what i intend to do here.
Hopefully my leaflet done in Photoshop, will be kickass and with you guys help it will be.

item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

[quote=“kmb, post:9, topic:31050”]Black Book of RS Cheating might help you with the history part.[/quote]I’ve read it before. Can anyone link me to it? I cant find it anywhere on the web…

Read full topic
